<S%H369>"There<s%> is <S%H8416>praise<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer;<s%> In <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> they have <S%H2803>devised<s%> <S%H9567>calamity<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her: <S%H1980>'Come<s%> and let us <S%H3772>cut<s%> her <S%H3772>off<s%> from [being] a <S%H1471>nation!<s%>' You <S%H1571>too,<s%> <S%H4086>Madmen,<s%> will be <S%H1826>silenced;<s%> The <S%H2719>sword<s%> will <S%H310>follow<s%> <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you.
"The <S%H6963>sound<s%> of an <S%H6818>outcry<s%> from <S%H2773>Horonaim,<s%> <S%H7701>'Devastation<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>destruction!<s%>'
<S%H4124>"Moab<s%> is <S%H7665>broken,<s%> Her <S%H6810>little<s%> <S%H6810>ones<s%> have <S%H8085>sounded<s%> out a <S%H2201>cry<s%> [of distress.]

"For by the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H3872>Luhith<s%> They will <S%H5927>ascend<s%> with <S%H1065>continual<s%> <S%H1065>weeping;<s%> For at the <S%H4174>descent<s%> of <S%H2773>Horonaim<s%> They have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H9496>anguished<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> of <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>
<S%H5127>"Flee,<s%> <S%H4422>save<s%> your <S%H5315>lives,<s%> That you may be like a <S%H6176>juniper<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

"For <S%H3282>because<s%> of your <S%H982>trust<s%> in your own <S%H4639>achievements<s%> and <S%H214>treasures,<s%> <S%H1571>Even<s%> you <S%H9040>yourself<s%> will be <S%H3920>captured;<s%> And <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> will <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>off<s%> into <S%H1473>exile<s%> <S%H9191>Together<s%> with his <S%H3548>priests<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes.<s%>

"And a <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> So that <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> will <S%H4422>escape;<s%> The <S%H6010>valley<s%> also will be ruined, And the <S%H6>plateau<s%> will be <S%H4334>destroyed,<s%> As the <S%H8045>Lord<s%> has <S%H3068>said.<s%>

<S%H5414>"Give<s%> <S%H9481>wings<s%> to <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> For she will <S%H3318>flee<s%> <S%H3318>away;<s%> And her <S%H5892>cities<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> <S%H369>Without<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> in them.

<S%H779>"Cursed<s%> be the one who <S%H6213>does<s%> the Lord's <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H9559>negligently,<s%> And <S%H779>cursed<s%> be the one who <S%H4513>restrains<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> from <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

<S%H4124>"Moab<s%> has <S%H7599>been<s%> at <S%H7599>ease<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> his <S%H5271>youth;<s%> He has also <S%H8252>been<s%> <S%H8252>undisturbed<s%> on his <S%H8105>lees,<s%> <S%H3808>Neither<s%> has he been <S%H9553>emptied<s%> from <S%H3627>vessel<s%> to <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> has he <S%H1980>gone<s%> into <S%H1473>exile.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H5975>retains<s%> his <S%H2940>flavor,<s%> And his <S%H7381>aroma<s%> has not <S%H4171>changed.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H935>coming,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "when I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> to him those who <S%H6808>tip<s%> <S%H3627>[vessels,<s%>] and they will <S%H6808>tip<s%> him <S%H6808>over,<s%> and they will <S%H9553>empty<s%> his vessels and <S%H5310>shatter<s%> his <S%H9311>jars.<s%>

"And <S%H4124>Moab<s%> will be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of <S%H3645>Chemosh,<s%> as the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> their <S%H4009>confidence.<s%>
<S%H349>"How<s%> can you <S%H559>say,<s%> 'We are <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>warriors,<s%> And <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H2428>valiant<s%> for <S%H4421>battle<s%>'?

<S%H4124>"Moab<s%> has been <S%H7703>destroyed,<s%> and men have <S%H5927>gone<s%> up to his <S%H5892>cities;<s%> His <S%H4005>choicest<s%> <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men<s%> have also <S%H3381>gone<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter,<s%>" <S%H5002>Declares<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>
"The <S%H343>disaster<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> will <S%H7138>soon<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> And his <S%H9567>calamity<s%> has <S%H3966>swiftly<s%> <S%H4116>hastened.<s%>

<S%H5110>"Mourn<s%> for him, <S%H3605>all<s%> you who [live] <S%H5439>around<s%> him, Even <S%H3605>all<s%> of you who <S%H3045>know<s%> his <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H559>Say,<s%> <S%H351>'How<s%> has the <S%H5797>mighty<s%> <S%H4294>scepter<s%> been <S%H7665>broken,<s%> A <S%H4731>staff<s%> of <S%H8597>splendor!<s%>'

<S%H3381>"Come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from your <S%H9202>glory<s%> And <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H6772>parched<s%> <S%H6772>ground,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> in <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> For the <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> has <S%H5927>come<s%> up against you, He has <S%H7843>ruined<s%> your <S%H4013>strongholds.<s%>

<S%H5975>"Stand<s%> by the <S%H1870>road<s%> and <S%H6822>keep<s%> <S%H6822>watch,<s%> O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6177>Aroer;<s%> <S%H7592>Ask<s%> him who <S%H5127>flees<s%> and her who <S%H4422>escapes<s%> [And] <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>'What<s%> has <S%H1961>happened<s%>?'

<S%H4124>"Moab<s%> has <S%H954>been<s%> <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame,<s%> for it has <S%H2865>been<s%> <S%H2865>shattered.<s%> <S%H3213>Wail<s%> and <S%H2199>cry<s%> out; <S%H5046>Declare<s%> by the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> That <S%H4124>Moab<s%> has been <S%H7703>destroyed.<s%>
<S%H4941>"Judgment<s%> has also <S%H935>come<s%> upon the <S%H4334>plain,<s%> upon <S%H2473>Holon,<s%> <S%H3096>Jahzah,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4158>Mephaath,<s%>
<S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> and Beth-diblathaim,
<S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7156>Kiriathaim,<s%> Beth-gamul, and Beth-meon,
<S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7152>Kerioth,<s%> <S%H1224>Bozrah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> and <S%H7138>near.<s%>
"The <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> has been <S%H1438>cut<s%> <S%H1438>off,<s%> and his <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H7665>broken,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H7937>"Make<s%> him <S%H7937>drunk,<s%> for he has <S%H1431>become<s%> <S%H1431>arrogant<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> so <S%H4124>Moab<s%> will <S%H5606>wallow<s%> in his <S%H9514>vomit,<s%> and he <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H7814>laughingstock.<s%>

"Now was not <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H7814>laughingstock<s%> to you? <S%H518>Or<s%> was he <S%H4672>caught<s%> among <S%H1590>thieves<s%>? For <S%H1767>each<s%> <S%H1767>time<s%> you <S%H1697>speak<s%> about him you <S%H5110>shake<s%> [your head in scorn.]

<S%H5800>"Leave<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> and <S%H7931>dwell<s%> among the <S%H5553>crags,<s%> O <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> And be like a <S%H3123>dove<s%> that <S%H7077>nests<s%> <S%H5676>Beyond<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6354>chasm.<s%>

"We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> – he [is] <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1343>proud<s%> – Of his <S%H7312>haughtiness,<s%> his <S%H1347>pride,<s%> his <S%H1346>arrogance<s%> and his self-exaltation.

"I <S%H3045>know<s%> his <S%H5678>fury,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "But it is <S%H3808>futile<s%><S%H9210>;<s%> His <S%H907>idle<s%> <S%H907>boasts<s%> have <S%H6213>accomplished<s%> <S%H3808>nothing.<s%>

<S%H5921>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I shall <S%H3213>wail<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> Even for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall I <S%H2199>cry<s%> out; I will <S%H1897>moan<s%> for the <S%H376>men<s%> of Kir-heres.

<S%H4480>"More<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H1065>weeping<s%> for <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> I shall <S%H1058>weep<s%> for you, O <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H7643>Sibmah!<s%> Your <S%H5189>tendrils<s%> <S%H5674>stretched<s%> <S%H5674>across<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> They <S%H5060>reached<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3270>Jazer;<s%> Upon your <S%H7019>summer<s%> <S%H7019>fruits<s%> and your <S%H1210>grape<s%> <S%H1210>harvest<s%> The <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> has <S%H5307>fallen.<s%>

"So <S%H8057>gladness<s%> and <S%H1524>joy<s%> are <S%H622>taken<s%> <S%H622>away<s%> From the <S%H3759>fruitful<s%> <S%H3759>field,<s%> even from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%> And I have made the <S%H3196>wine<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from the <S%H3342>wine<s%> <S%H3342>presses;<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> one will <S%H1869>tread<s%> [them] with <S%H1959>shouting,<s%> The <S%H1959>shouting<s%> will not be <S%H1959>shouts<s%> [of joy.]

"From the <S%H2201>outcry<s%> at <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> even to <S%H500>Elealeh,<s%> even to <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%> they have <S%H5414>raised<s%> their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> from <S%H6820>Zoar<s%> even to <S%H2773>Horonaim<s%> [and to] Eglath-shelishiyah; for <S%H1571>even<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5249>Nimrim<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H4923>desolate.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H7673>make<s%> an <S%H7673>end<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "the one who <S%H5927>offers<s%> [sacrifice] on the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place<s%> and the one who <S%H6999>burns<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to his <S%H430>gods.<s%>

<S%H5921>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1993>wails<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab<s%> like <S%H2485>flutes;<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> also <S%H1993>wails<s%> like <S%H2485>flutes<s%> for the <S%H376>men<s%> of Kir-heres. <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they have lost the <S%H6>abundance<s%> it <S%H3502>produced.<s%>

"For <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> is <S%H7144>bald<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2206>beard<s%> <S%H1639>cut<s%> <S%H1639>short;<s%> there are <S%H1417>gashes<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> and <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> on the <S%H4975>loins.<s%>

"On <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1406>housetops<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and in its <S%H7339>streets<s%> <S%H3605>there<s%> is <S%H4553>lamentation<s%> <S%H3605>everywhere;<s%> for I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> like an <S%H369>undesirable<s%> <S%H2656><s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H349>"How<s%> <S%H2865>shattered<s%> it is! <S%H349>[How<s%>] they have <S%H3213>wailed!<s%> How <S%H4124>Moab<s%> has <S%H6437>turned<s%> his <S%H6203>back<s%> – he is <S%H954>ashamed!<s%> So <S%H4124>Moab<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H7814>laughingstock<s%> and an <S%H4288>object<s%> of <S%H4288>terror<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> him."

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> one will <S%H1675>fly<s%> <S%H1675>swiftly<s%> like an <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> And <S%H6566>spread<s%> out his <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

<S%H7152>"Kerioth<s%> has been <S%H3920>captured<s%> And the <S%H4679>strongholds<s%> have been <S%H8610>seized,<s%> So the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> Will be like the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> in <S%H9504>labor.<s%>

"And <S%H4124>Moab<s%> will be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from [being] a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> he has <S%H1431>become<s%> <S%H1431>arrogant<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H6343>"Terror,<s%> <S%H6354>pit,<s%> and <S%H6341>snare<s%> are [coming] upon you, O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H188>"Woe<s%> to you, <S%H4124>Moab!<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> have perished; For your <S%H6>sons<s%> have been <S%H1121>taken<s%> away <S%H3947>captive,<s%> And your <S%H7628>daughters<s%> into <S%H1323>captivity.<s%>

"Yet I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> In the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> <S%H2008>Thus<s%> <S%H5704>far<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> on <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>
